summary.span: 绑定元素，指定用于基于文本的 SOAP 消息的字符编码与消息版本管理。

span.span: The binding element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for text-based SOAP messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将消息转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解码是反向过程。Decoding is the reverse process. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 包含三种类型的 SOAP 消息编码：文本、二进制和消息传输优化机制 (MTOM)。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM). 由 表示的文本编码互操作性最强，但效率最低的 XML 消息编码器。The text encoding represented by the is the most interoperable, but the least efficient encoder for XML messages. Web 服务或 Web 服务客户端通常可以理解文本 XML。Web service or Web service client can generally understand textual XML. 但是，将大型二进制数据块作为文本传输不是有效的传输方式。However, transmitting large blocks of binary data as text is not efficient. 有关详细信息的绑定元素的指定消息进行编码使用.NET 二进制 XML 格式，请参阅。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the .NET Binary Format for XML, see . 消息编码使用 MTOM 消息编码绑定元素，指定有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the MTOM message encoding, see . 有关如何实现自定义消息编码器的详细信息，请使用类。For more information about how to implement a custom message encoder, use the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 创建一个从当前对象初始化的新 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其属性值等于当前元素的属性值。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 这称为复制整个对象图。通过返回深层克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。(This is called copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncoderFactory CreateMessageEncoderFactory() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateMessageEncoderFactory () As MessageEncoderFactory

summary.span: 创建一个文本消息编码器工厂，该文本消息编码器利用由当前编码绑定元素指定的消息版本与字符编码。

span.span: Creates a factory for text message encoders that employs the message version and character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
The that this factory creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工厂生成的 对象可以从流中读取消息并将消息写入流以进行特定类型的消息编码。The objects that the factory produces can read messages from a stream and write them to a stream for specific types of message encoding.

Public Overrides Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.
The for the binding element.

summary.span: 从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回一个用于设置属性或获取状态的类型化对象。Use this to request a typed object for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有绑定元素层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxReadPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxReadPoolSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置读取器数量，该读取器会被分配到池中，并随时可以用于处理传入消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of readers that are allocated to a pool and ready for use to process incoming messages.
The number of readers in the pool.

value.span: 默认值为 64 个读取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传入消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的读取器，而不必创建新的读取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool that have already been created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWritePoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxWritePoolSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置编写器数量，该编写器会被分配到池中，并随时可以用于处理传出消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of writers that are allocated to a pool and ready for use to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 要保留在池中的编写器的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of writers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 默认值为 16 个编写器。

span.span: The default value is 16 writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传出消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的编写器，而不必创建新的编写器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that have already been created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 为交换的 SOAP 消息指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表达这些约束及其默认值的属性如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384

summary.span: 获取或设置用于格式化文本消息中字符的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding that is used to format the characters in the text message.

value.span: 用于格式化文本消息中字符的 。

span.span: The that is used to format the characters in the text message.

value.span: 默认文本编码为 UTF-8 格式。

span.span: The default text encoding is the UTF-8 format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指定内容类型，如"utf-16"的 XML 声明需要在消息中。When specifying a content type such as "utf-16" an XML declaration is required in the message. 或者你可以指定"-16LE"或"-16BE"并不是必需的 XML 声明。Alternatively you can specify either "utf-16LE" or "utf-16BE" and an XML declaration is not required.

span.span: The value is .
value is not valid.
